original_text: Because thou hast had a perpetual hatred, and hast shed the blood of the children of Israel by the force of the sword in the time of their calamity, in the time that their iniquity had an end:
korean_text: 네가 옛날부터 한을 품고 이스라엘 족속의 환난 때 곧 죄악의 마지막 때에 칼의 위력에 그들을 넘겼도다

sentences.original_text: Because thou hast had a perpetual hatred
and hast shed the blood of the children of Israel
by the force of the sword
in the time of their calamity
in the time that their iniquity had an end
